gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.desc: FontMinifyGenerateCSS is a web tool designed to compress font files and generate CSS code for optimal web performance. Follow these steps to effectively use FontMinify:

stepList.title: 1. Upload Font Files
stepList.desc:
Click the 'Upload Fonts' button to select the font files you want to compress. FontMinifyGenerateCSS supports various font formats,
 including TTF, OTF, and WOFF.

stepList.title: 2. Specify Text for Subsetting
stepList.desc: Enter the specific text or characters you want to include in the subsetted font. This ensures that only the necessary glyphs are retained, reducing the file size.

stepList.title: 3. Choose Compression Options
stepList.desc: Choose your desired compression options. FontMinifyGenerateCSS offers various settings to balance file size reduction and font quality. Select the options that best suit your needs.

stepList.title: 4. Review and Download Results
stepList.desc: Review the results of the compression process. FontMinifyGenerateCSS will display the original and compressed file sizes, along with the generated CSS code. Download the compressed font files and CSS code.
